snippet: “Game Change,” an HBO movie to be shown on Saturday, has sparked conspiracy theories among conservative allies of Sarah Palin. The film’s creators deny any political agenda.
abstract: HBO television movie Game Change, based on the book of same name exploring the 2008 presidential campaign, sparks controversy by focusing only on the two months when Sarah Palin was running for vice president on John McCain's ticket; conservatives claim that film seeks to undermine a future run for president by Palin though its creators deny any political agenda.
lead_paragraph: “Game Change,” an HBO movie to be shown on Saturday, has sparked conspiracy theories among conservative allies of Sarah Palin. The film’s creators deny any political agenda.

headline.seo: ‘Game Change’ on HBO, With Julianne Moore as Sarah Palin
headline.main: Rogue, Rube or G.O.P. Star: Portraying Palin
headline.print_headline: Rogue, Rube or G.O.P. Star: Portraying Palin
